title: Bak Seon-yeong (voice actress)
text: Bak Seon-yeong (<a href="Hangul">Hangul</a>: 박선영; born February 8, 1970) is a <a href="Koreans">South Korean</a> <a href="voice%20acting">voice actress</a> who joined the <a href="Munhwa%20Broadcasting%20Corporation">Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation</a>'s <a href="MBC%20Voice%20Acting%20Division">voice acting division</a> in 1997, she was voiced Kang Lim's mother in <a href="Tooniverse">Tooniverse</a>'s <a href="The%20Haunted%20House%20%28anime%29">The Haunted House</a> series.
